dcterms:description: A training dataset consisting of 15 million English utterances, anonymized and hand-transcribed, representative of Google's voice search traffic. The data is artificially corrupted using a room simulator with varying noise and reverberation levels, resulting in an overall SNR between 0 dB and 30 dB, with an average SNR of 12 dB. The noise sources include YouTube and daily life noisy environmental recordings.
dcterms:title: Google Voice Search Training Dataset

dcterms:creator: Tara N. Sainath

Zhifeng Chen
dcterms:description: A test dataset consisting of 14,800 anonymized, hand-transcribed English utterances extracted from Google's voice search traffic. This dataset is used to evaluate the performance of the improved neural transducer model.
dcterms:title: Google Voice Search Test Dataset
